title: RABBI YISROEL DOVID WEISS ON ZIONISM AND PALESTINE | Escaping the Cave Ep. 4
description:
In this special episode of Escaping the Cave with Carlos Garrido we are honored to be joined by Rabbi Yisroel Dovid Weiss, who tells us about the history of Jewish and Muslim peaceful coexistence in Western Asia, the role of the Zionist entity in destabilizing that and promoting antisemitism, and the importance of distinguishing Judaism from Zionism. 

Check out our Publishing Press books and journals here: https://www.midwesternmarx.com/books.html 

If you enjoyed our video, please consider checking our website out: 
https://www.midwesternmarx.com/
